title: Is there any reason why Cancer Tempest pierce through Counterstrike?

replies.body: He means why Jax can't dodge Yasuo's Q, even though it is believed to count as an auto (I might be wrong on this).

I'd say there are a couple possibilities.

1: It only applies on hit effects, but hits as a spell.
2: Because on-hit effects are only applied to the first enemy hit, it goes through dodge if Jax isn't the first enemy hit by it.

I'm just guessing though.

i always noticed this,even when i was the first target,it still pierced through it and dealt the full Critical damage.
long ago Riot decided to fix jax's shit by making on hit effects that passed through it just cancel,Nasus's Q,Renekton's W,and more.
but i havent fixed in Yasuo's case.
I would love to get some contex from a red on this
Yasuo's whole Q crits together, but only the closest enemy has on-hits applied.

Jax E can dodge Yasuo Q... I've done it plenty of times...

Then again, I'm usually wrong.
